description: Manage security admin configuration with network.

commands.name: az network manager security-admin-config create
commands.summary: Create a network manager security admin configuration.
commands.syntax:
az network manager security-admin-config create --config
                                                --manager-name
                                                --resource-group
                                                [--aggregation {Manual, None}]
                                                [--apply-on]
                                                [--description]
examples: az network manager security-admin-config create --configuration-name "myTestSecurityConfig" --network-manager-name "TestNetworkManager" --resource-group "rg1" --description "A sample policy" --apply-on None

commands.name: az network manager security-admin-config delete
commands.summary: Delete a network manager security admin configuration.
commands.syntax:
az network manager security-admin-config delete [--config]
                                                [--force {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                [--ids]
                                                [--manager-name]
                                                [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                [--resource-group]
                                                [--subscription]
                                                [--yes]
examples: az network manager security-admin-config delete --configuration-name "myTestSecurityConfig" --network-manager-name "testNetworkManager" --resource-group "rg1" --force n

commands.name: az network manager security-admin-config list
commands.summary: List all the network manager security admin configurations in a network manager, in a paginated format.

commands.name: az network manager security-admin-config show
commands.summary: Get a network manager security admin configuration.

commands.name: az network manager security-admin-config update
commands.summary: Update a network manager security admin configuration.
commands.syntax:
az network manager security-admin-config update [--add]
                                                [--aggregation {Manual, None}]
                                                [--apply-on]
                                                [--config]
                                                [--description]
                                                [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                [--ids]
                                                [--manager-name]
                                                [--remove]
                                                [--resource-group]
                                                [--set]
                                                [--subscription]
examples: az network manager security-admin-config update --configuration-name "myTestSecurityConfig" --network-manager-name "TestNetworkManager" --resource-group "rg1" --description "A sample policy" --apply-on None

commands.name: az network manager security-admin-config wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
